00022 template<class T> class scoped_ptr {
00023  private:
00024   T * ptr_;
00025   scoped_ptr(scoped_ptr const &);
00026   scoped_ptr & operator= (scoped_ptr const &);
00027   typedef scoped_ptr<T> this_type;
00028 
00029  public:
00030   typedef T element_type;
00031   explicit scoped_ptr(T * p = 0): ptr_(p) {}
00032   virtual ~scoped_ptr() { delete ptr_; }
00033   void reset(T * p = 0) {
00034     delete ptr_;
00035     ptr_ = p;
00036   }
00037   T & operator*() const   { return *ptr_; }
00038   T * operator->() const  { return ptr_;  }
00039   T * get() const         { return ptr_;  }
00040 };
00041 
00042 template<class T> class scoped_array {
00043  private:
00044   T * ptr_;
00045   scoped_array(scoped_array const &);
00046   scoped_array & operator= (scoped_array const &);
00047   typedef scoped_array<T> this_type;
00048 
00049  public:
00050   typedef T element_type;
00051   explicit scoped_array(T * p = 0): ptr_(p) {}
00052   virtual ~scoped_array() { delete [] ptr_; }
00053   void reset(T * p = 0) {
00054     delete [] ptr_;
00055     ptr_ = p;
00056   }
00057   T & operator*() const   { return *ptr_; }
00058   T * operator->() const  { return ptr_;  }
00059   T * get() const         { return ptr_;  }
00060   T & operator[](size_t i) const   { return ptr_[i]; }
00061 };
00062 
00063 class scoped_string: public scoped_array<char> {
00064  public:
00065   explicit scoped_string() { reset_string(""); }
00066   explicit scoped_string(const std::string &str) {
00067     reset_string(str);
00068   }
00069 
00070   void reset_string(const std::string &str) {
00071     char *p = new char[str.size() + 1];
00072     std::strcpy(p, str.c_str());
00073     reset(p);
00074   }
00075 
00076   void reset_string(const char *str) {
00077     char *p = new char[std::strlen(str) + 1];
00078     std::strcpy(p, str);
00079     reset(p);
00080   }
00081 };
